function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Homogeneity in the effect of temperature and humidity on the seasonal variability and spread of the virus","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 due to favorable cool and dry conditions","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control spread under cool and dry conditions, improve surveillance and containment policies","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity monitoring, surveillance systems","People":"General population, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate statistical analysis compromising conclusions about the effect of temperature and humidity on virus spread","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the relationship between temperature, humidity, and virus spread","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous statistical analysis, validate findings with additional studies","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data validation methods","People":"Research scientists, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific community"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the impact of meteorological factors on epidemic trends","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the factors influencing epidemic trends","Mitigation":"Study the combined effect of multiple meteorological factors, consider confounding variables","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, meteorologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
